remarks: A projection from a product of monoids to one of the factors is a monoid homomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
prdspjmhm.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdspjmhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdspjmhm.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
prdspjmhm.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. X ) $.
prdspjmhm.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Mnd ) $.
prdspjmhm.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. I ) $.
prdspjmhm $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> ( x ` A ) ) e. ( Y MndHom ( R ` A ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d R x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
